amendment.description: To make a technical correction to the United States leadership Against HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis, and Malaria Act of 2003.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1172 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1172 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Santorum to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9173-9174; text: CR S9173) To make a technical correction to the United States leadership Against HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis, and Malaria Act of 2003.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1172 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1172 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Santorum to Amendment SA 1136.
